source_reference.text: How We Keep Christ at the Center of Our Marriage! Godly Marriage Tips! (Video by BrylanRiggs)

content_summary: A few things we do to keep Christ at the center of our marriage :) Keeping God first in your relationship with your spouse can sometimes be tricky, but with a few of these easy & simple Godly marriage tips you can be on track to a more fulfilling and Christ-centered relationship :)
